mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO SUCCESS_KILLED(seckill_id, user_phone, state) VALUE (#{seckillId}, #{userPhone}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.state, sk.create_time, s.seckill_id as "seckill.seckillId", s.name as "seckill.name", s.number as "seckill.number", s.start_time as "seckill.startTime", s.end_time as "seckill.endTime", s.create_time as "seckill.createTime" FROM success_killed as sk INNER JOIN seckill as s on sk.seckill_id=s.seckill_id WHERE sk.seckill_id=#{seckillId}

SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.state, sk.create_time, s.seckill_id as "seckill.seckillId", s.name as "seckill.name" s.number as "seckill.number", s.start_time as "seckill.startTime", s.end_time as "seckill.endTime", s.create_time as "seckill.createTime" FROM success_killed as sk INNER JOIN seckill as s on sk.seckill_id=s.seckill_id WHERE sk.seckill_id=#{seckillId} AND sk.user_phone=#{userPhone}
